trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados de evento que são usados como um objeto de parâmetro no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"> </xref> eventos da raiz <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é exposta como o `e` parâmetro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>é gerado antes de uma nova é exibida, como resultado do usuário final clicando e arrastando-se em uma área do gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>é gerado depois que a nova exibição é criada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: É importante observar que a posição e o tamanho de um modo de exibição não podem ser definidas a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>evento porque, nesse caso, o modo de exibição já foi criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: A classe ViewEventArgs contém as seguintes propriedades: - o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade, que é usada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>do objeto no qual a exibição está sendo exibida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>propriedade obtém o nome da área do gráfico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades da área do gráfico também podem ser definidas.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>propriedade, que é usada para obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto ao qual a exibição está associada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo de eixo, que pode ser X, Y, X2 ou Y2, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades de eixo também podem ser definidas.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>propriedade, que representa a nova posição de uma exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade, que representa o novo tamanho de uma exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>propriedade, que representa a unidade de medida para o tamanho de uma exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe com especificado axis e newPosition parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: O eixo da exibição de escala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial da nova exibição da escala.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe com especificado axis , newPosition , newSize e newSizeType parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: O eixo da exibição de escala.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A posição inicial da nova exibição da escala.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: O novo tamanho de exibição de escala.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A unidade de medida para o tamanho da nova exibição da escala.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto ao qual pertence um modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para:-determinar o tipo de eixo – X, X2, Y ou Y2 — que o evento está sendo gerado, usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Obter e definir propriedades de eixo, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que representa o eixo de um modo de exibição pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto ao qual pertence um modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>propriedade pode ser usada para determinar a área do gráfico que o modo de exibição pertence, acessando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade também pode ser usada para obter e definir propriedades da área do gráfico.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto que representa a área do gráfico um modo de exibição pertence.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a nova posição de uma exibição ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é exposta na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>eventos da raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>de objeto e representa a nova posição de uma exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NewPosition pode ser definida para um novo valor no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento, mas não pode ser definida para um novo valor para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>evento porque, nesse caso, o modo de exibição já foi criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: O NewPosition sempre é medida como um valor do eixo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa a posição de uma exibição ao longo do eixo, que é a parte inferior de uma exibição vertical ou a posição esquerda de uma exibição horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho de um modo de exibição ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o tamanho de uma exibição ao longo do eixo.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho é a altura da exibição vertical ou a largura da exibição horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a unidade de medida para o novo tamanho de um modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, a unidade de medida para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade é determinada automaticamente pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controlar e será um número ou um dia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Lembre-se de que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade sempre é medida como um valor do eixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que, se você definir explicitamente o tipo de tamanho, o tipo corresponde o eixo que pertence a barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: Em outras palavras, não especifique <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>se não usa o eixo <xref:System.DateTime>valores.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>propriedade pode ser definida para um novo valor no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>evento, mas não pode ser definida para um novo valor para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>evento porque o modo de exibição já foi criado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que representa a unidade de medida para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>propriedade, que representa a largura ou altura de uma exibição de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.
